fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player at night with your knife.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you shoot a player and their role is publicly revealed to be a Townie you will die of guilt the next night.
- You clean your kills.
- this is a /j i do not want you to shut up i appreciate the constructive feedback (which i will NOT apply) and i thought this was a hilarious addition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
